mapper.select: select id as id, share_bill_no as shareBillNo, user_id as userId, `user_name` as userName, phone_no as phoneNo, organize_id as organizeId, `organize_name` as organizeName, real_money as realMoney, quantity as quantity, price as price, amount as amount, refund_amount as refundAmount, relation_info as relationInfo, order_no as orderNo, order_create_time as orderCreateTime, status as status, created_time as createdTime, updated_time as updatedTime, share_type as shareType, level as level from wx_mall_social_share_flow where order_no=#{orderNo}
